description: Cables Unlimited HDMI Home Theater cables deliver HD picture and multi-channel audio to your home theater through a single user friendly cable. These premium cables meet the latest HDMI 1.3 standard, support a 10.2Gbps bandwidth and the next generation xvYCC color technology for up to 1.8 times as many colors as the existing HD signal. Connect today's HD equipment with the cables of tomorrow.
title: Cables Unlimited Premium 2 Meter Version 1.3 HDMI Home Theater Cable (PCM229502M)
